title: Improve UX and resell
description: Find a successful product that has terrible UX, improve the UX and re-sell to frustrated customers
examples: Legacy ERP software, SAP, more examples to come...

title: Small but better
description: Find a large business and do a small part better

title: Just 1%
description: Capture 1% of a very large and profitable market

title: White label and resell
description: Resell a whitelabelled product in a proven market

title: The opposite of a good idea
description: The opposite of a good idea can also be a good idea
examples: Red bull, more examples to come...

title: Counter intuitive ideas
description: Focus on solving problems through wit, psychology and emotion (perception, illusion, influence) instead of technology or capital
examples: De Beers, more examples to come...

title: Solve own problems
description: Solve your own problems and see if there's a market for it
examples: AWS, Freelancer, Airtasker, more examples to come...
